entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.2°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along the coast. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
